footer.description: Inspiring excellence in education and preparing students for a dynamic future. Featuring world-class facilities including a half Olympic pool.

contactSection.title: Get in Touch
contactSection.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions and welcome you to our community.

learning.title: State-of-the-Art Learning Environment
learning.desc: Our campus is thoughtfully designed to inspire learning at every corner. From cutting-edge science laboratories to our half Olympic pool, every space is crafted to enhance the educational experience and foster innovation.
learning.modernClassroomsDesc: Interactive technology and flexible learning spaces designed for collaboration
learning.poolDesc: Professional swimming facility for competitive training and recreational activities
learning.researchDesc: Advanced labs for scientific discovery and hands-on experimentation
learning.creativeDesc: Inspiring spaces for arts, music, theater, and digital media production

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: From early childhood through graduation, plus our exciting summer camp program, we offer comprehensive educational experiences designed to nurture growth and inspire curiosity.
programs.elementaryDesc: Foundation years focused on creativity, exploration, and fundamental skills development in a nurturing environment.
programs.middleDesc: Transitional years emphasizing critical thinking, collaboration, and personal growth through innovative curriculum.
programs.highDesc: Advanced preparation for university with rigorous academics, leadership opportunities, and global perspectives.
programs.summerDesc: An exciting summer program featuring swimming in our half Olympic pool, arts, sports, and academic enrichment activities.

admissionsCTA.title: Ready to Join Our Community?
admissionsCTA.subtitle: Take the first step towards an exceptional educational journey. Our admissions team is here to guide you through the process.

aboutSection.title: Cultivating Excellence Since 1985
aboutSection.desc1: Zenit School stands as a beacon of educational excellence, where innovation meets tradition. Our commitment to holistic education ensures that every student develops not just academically, but as a confident, creative, and compassionate global citizen.
aboutSection.desc2: With campuses designed to inspire learning and a curriculum that bridges disciplines, we prepare students for the challenges and opportunities of tomorrow while fostering a lifelong love of learning.
aboutSection.facilitiesDesc: Our campus features state-of-the-art learning spaces, including a half Olympic pool for aquatic programs and competitive swimming.

whyZenit.title: Why Choose Zenit?
whyZenit.subtitle: What makes Zenit School stand out for students and families.

reasons.title: Academic Excellence
reasons.text: Challenging curriculum, dedicated teachers, and individual support.

reasons.title: Facilities
reasons.text: Modern classrooms, labs, and a half Olympic swimming pool.

reasons.title: Diverse Community
reasons.text: Students from many backgrounds learn and grow together.

reasons.title: Strong Support
reasons.text: Close collaboration with families to help every student thrive.

reasons.title: Future Skills
reasons.text: STEAM focus, critical thinking, creativity and leadership.

classroom.title: Inside the Classroom
classroom.subtitle: How learning happens at Zenit: engaging, practical and student-centered.

hero.title: Active, Hands-On Learning
hero.text: Lessons combine projects, labs and discussions, supported by technology and clear learning goals.

features.title: Labs & Projects
features.text: Science experiments, makerspace builds, and real-world problem solving.

features.title: Digital Tools
features.text: Interactive boards, tablets and learning platforms enhance participation.

features.title: Personalised Support
features.text: Formative feedback and small group coaching.

activities.title: Activities & Clubs
activities.subtitle: Opportunities to discover passions beyond the classroom.

culture.title: School Culture
culture.subtitle: The values that define our community.

intro.title: Building a Respectful, Supportive Environment
intro.text1: At Zenit School, our culture is built on empathy, curiosity, and collaboration. We believe that learning happens best in a community that values every voice and celebrates diversity.
intro.text2: From classroom discussions to school events, our students learn to think critically, communicate openly, and grow together as confident, kind individuals.

pillars.title: Respect & Inclusion
pillars.text: Every individual is welcomed and supported.

pillars.title: Growth Mindset
pillars.text: We learn from mistakes and celebrate progress.

pillars.title: Community
pillars.text: Students, families, and staff work together.

pillars.title: Integrity
pillars.text: Honesty and responsibility guide our choices.

gallery.title: Community & Life at Zenit
gallery.subtitle: Our days are filled with creativity, teamwork, and moments that strengthen our spirit.

cta.title: Be Part of Our Community
cta.text: Zenit School is more than a place to learn ‚Äî it‚Äôs a place to belong. Join our events, volunteer, and grow with us.

posts.title: Zenit Swim Team Wins Regional Cup
posts.excerpt: Our swimmers achieved outstanding results in the regional finals held this weekend.

posts.title: New Robotics Lab Opens
posts.excerpt: A modern robotics space with 3D printers and microcontrollers is now open to students.

posts.title: Parent Community Day
posts.excerpt: Workshops and activities to meet teachers and discover programs for the new year.

director.title: From the Director
director.subtitle: A message of welcome and purpose.
paragraphs: At Zenit, we believe every learner is capable of excellence with the right guidance and care.
Our programs balance academic rigor with the arts, athletics, and character education.
I invite you to visit our campus and experience our community first-hand.
director.name: Butrint Deshishku

mission.subtitle: Our purpose and the future we strive to create.
mission.missionText: Provide an exceptional education that nurtures curiosity, integrity and service.
mission.visionText: Inspire students to reach their full potential and contribute meaningfully to society.

values.title: Growth
values.text: Resilience, reflection and a love of learning.

how.title: How to Apply
how.text: Submit your resume and a brief letter of intent. We review applications on a rolling basis.

scholarships.title: Scholarships and Awards
scholarships.subtitle: Merit- and need-based opportunities that support our learners.

items.a: We review on a rolling basis; priority by May 31.

items.q: Can I apply to multiple programs?
items.a: Yes, you may apply to more than one; awards cannot be stacked beyond 50%.

aboutPage.title: About Zenit School
aboutPage.subtitle: Discover our rich history, educational philosophy, and commitment to excellence that has shaped generations of leaders.

history.heading: Our Story Since 1985
paragraphs: Zenit School was founded with a vision to prepare students not just for academic success, but for leadership in an ever-changing world. From our beginnings with 50 students, we have grown into a premier institution serving 450 students from 35 countries.

Our founders believed in combining rigorous academics with character development‚Äîa philosophy that still guides our mission. The addition of our half Olympic pool in 1995 marked our commitment to wellness and competitive excellence.

timeline.title: School Founded
timeline.text: Zenit School opens its doors with 50 students and a vision for excellence.

timeline.title: Olympic Pool Added
timeline.text: Half Olympic pool constructed, establishing our aquatic program.

timeline.title: International Recognition
timeline.text: Achieved international accreditation and expanded global partnerships.

timeline.title: 40 Years Strong
timeline.text: Celebrating four decades of educational excellence and innovation.

mv.missionText: To provide an exceptional educational experience that nurtures intellectual curiosity, develops character, and prepares students to be engaged global citizens.
mv.visionText: To be a leading institution that inspires students to reach their full potential and contribute meaningfully through innovation, collaboration, and service.

items.title: Academic Excellence
items.text: We maintain the highest standards of learning and intellectual growth.

items.title: Character Development
items.text: We foster integrity, empathy, and ethical leadership.

items.title: Global Citizenship
items.text: We prepare students to thrive in an interconnected, diverse world.

items.title: Holistic Wellness
items.text: We promote physical, mental, and emotional well-being.

faculty.title: Exceptional Faculty & Staff
faculty.text: Our dedicated team of 56 faculty members brings expertise from around the globe. With advanced degrees and years of experience, our teachers inspire and challenge every student.

facilities.title: Modern Learning Spaces
facilities.text: State-of-the-art classrooms with the latest technology for interactive learning.

facilities.title: Half Olympic Pool
facilities.text: Professional facility for competitive training, lessons, and recreation.

facilities.title: Research Library
facilities.text: Extensive books, digital resources, and quiet study spaces for research.

header.title: Our Programs
header.subtitle: Comprehensive educational programs designed to challenge, inspire, and prepare students for success ‚Äî from elementary through high school, plus our exciting Zenit Summer Camp.

elementary.title: Elementary School
elementary.desc: Foundation years focused on creativity, exploration, and fundamental skills development.
points: Swimming lessons in our half Olympic pool

highlight.title: Swimming Program:
highlight.text: All elementary students receive weekly instruction focusing on water safety and basic strokes.

middle.title: Middle School
middle.desc: Transitional years emphasizing critical thinking, collaboration, and personal growth.

highlight.title: Competitive Swimming:
highlight.text: Train in our half Olympic pool for regional and national competitions.

high.title: High School
high.desc: Advanced preparation for university with rigorous academics and leadership opportunities.

highlight.title: Elite Swimming:
highlight.text: Athletes compete at state and national levels; many receive college scholarships.

results.title: Academic Excellence & Results
results.text: Our rigorous academic programs consistently produce outstanding results. With a 98% university acceptance rate and graduates attending top institutions worldwide, our students are well-prepared for success.
